backend/main.mo: Main ICP actor defining all types (Trace, TraceEvent, Fill, WebhookAlert, Settings, etc.) and query/update methods for managing trade traces, webhook alerts, and settings with in-memory Maps.
backend/migration.mo: Trivial migration module with an empty OldActor type and a no-op run function used for canister state migration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented feature IDs to their affected files, related components, and test IDs for the webhook alerts log, AlertLog page, nav link, and route registration features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated JSON summaries of all frontend source files describing each component, hook, page, and config file's purpose in one or two sentences.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including background, foreground, card, border, chart, and sidebar color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell with a root div and a module script tag loading the React app entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with four routes (/, /trace/$traceId, /settings, /alerts) all wrapped in Layout, plus a dark-themed Sonner toaster.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: App shell component rendering a sticky top nav bar with Dashboard, Alert Log (Bell icon), and Settings links with active-state highlighting, a live indicator, and a footer.
frontend/src/components/RoundTurnSummary: Displays a round-turn trade summary card showing avg entry/exit, P&L, duration metrics, and separate entry/exit fills tables for a given trace.
frontend/src/components/SamplePayloadCar: Renders a card showing a sample TradingView alert JSON payload with a copy-to-clipboard button and webhook endpoint reference.
frontend/src/components/StatusBadge.tsx: Provides styled badge components for GhostStatus, TradeStatus, WebhookStatus, and trade action (long/short), mapping each status to a color class.
frontend/src/components/TraceFilters.tsx: Renders a filter bar with dropdowns and inputs for filtering traces by ticker, ghost status, Tradovate status, strategy, and date range.
frontend/src/components/TracesTable.tsx: Renders a paginated table of trade traces with columns for timestamp, ticker, action, strategy, prices, ghost/trade status, P&L, and duration, with row click navigation to trace detail pages.
frontend/src/components/TraceSummaryCard: Displays a detailed summary card for a single trace including IDs, timestamps, ticker, action, price levels, statuses, and an optional params snapshot.
frontend/src/components/TraceTimeline.ts: Renders a chronological event timeline card for a trace, with expandable rows showing source, event type, and timestamp for each TraceEvent.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGhostForwarding.ts: Custom hook that forwards a webhook payload to a Ghost URL via HTTP POST and updates the trace's ghost status (accepted/rejected) in the backend based on the response.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status using DFINITY's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for fetching and mutating traces, trace events, fills, settings, and webhook data against the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures Tailwind CSS, and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light/dark theme colors including status, chart, and sidebar variables.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility functions for class merging, timestamp/duration/price/P&L formatting, and label/color mapping for GhostStatus, TradeStatus, EventSource, and EventType enums.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/AlertLog.tsx: Page displaying a table of webhook alerts with collapsible rows showing raw payload details, status badges, and a refresh button.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page showing a filterable, refreshable table of pipeline traces with status filtering by ticker, strategy, ghost status, and date range.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Settings page for configuring API keys, webhook URL, risk method, and trade parameters, with a copyable TradingView webhook URL card.
frontend/src/pages/TraceDetail.tsx: Detail page for a single trace showing summary, timeline, and fill data fetched by trace ID, with a Tradovate refresh action.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom OKLCH-based color tokens, fonts, border radii, shadows, and animations for the design system.
project_state.json: Tracks the state of the trade-trace-mju TradingView webhook integration project, including architectural notes, known issues, existing features, and pending feature requests for a webhook alert log page.
